game.name: Caution Ahead: Part 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Face new dangers as John, a search and rescue officer. The game blends exploration with claustrophobic horror, featuring tense cave crawling.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Face new dangers as John, a search and rescue officer. The game blends exploration with claustrophobic horror, featuring tense cave crawling.
